name: Jiraiya Sweatshirt
description:
Featuring an original illustration by Jiraiya (児雷也), virtuoso of Japanese gay artwork and one of our favorite artists on the planet, the sweatshirt is an ode to gachimuchi (ガチムチ) love. Here's what Jiraiya said about the two men on the sweatshirt, Asakichi (朝吉) and Seiji (清次):
These two guys have the same muscle mass, but I'd guess different body fat percentages. In my opinion, they're a perfect couple. But if they fight, their house will be partially destroyed.
Order before the end of 2013 and get a free Jiraiya greeting card! Shipments will arrive after Christmas. Manufactured and Sublimation Printed in Los Angeles 91% Poly/5% Rayon/5% Spandex

name: Endless Game by Gengoroh Tagame
description:
Endless Game tells the tale of Akira, a college student with a "voracious appetite for sex" who gets more than he bargained for on a trip to the bathhouse. The second English-language book of Gengoroh Tagame's work presents his most recent mid-length story, and perhaps one of his most Dionysian. From Tagame's Afterword:
I write in a distinctly hardcore BDSM style, but with Endless Game I deliberately kept the BDSM tropes contained. [...] The story is what I imagine to be a plot driven by maximal iterations of 'gay pornographic intercourse'
Originally serialized in Badi magazine, Endless Game has yet to be collected in book form in Japan. Translation by MASSIVE's Anne Ishii! Page Count: 160 pages Dimensions: 7" x 9.75" Language: English Release Date: December 1st, 2013 Publisher: Bruno Gmünder

name: The Passion of Gengoroh Tagame: Limited Edition with Signed Bookplate
description: Gengoroh Tagame's first English-language anthology with a limited edition bookplate drawn, designed and signed by the master himself. A must-have for Tagame collectors! Book Description: Violent, visceral and provocative, to say the least, Gengoroh Tagame's unquestionable talent for story and illustration is already the stuff of legend. His gay BDSM stories are now widely celebrated for both their virtuosic drawing and their unparalleled passion. Produced by a veteran Japanist--Anne Ishii--The Passion of Gengoroh Tagame is a project that began some years ago, when Ishii was translating Chip Kidd's personal Tagame collection and decided to reach out to him. Inspired by filmmaker Graham Kolbeins' online work with gay comics, the project took on new ambitious proportions, materializing in this exciting celebration of one of the world's most poignant erotic artists. This hefty Tagame omnibus includes seven English editions of short stories dating from the late 1990s to 2012. The newest work is an original story commissioned by Kidd himself: Tagame's very first foray into writing directly for an American reader. Celebrated novelist and biographer Edmund White contributes an introduction to the volume. Gengoroh Tagame (born 1964) is a legend in gay comics throughout the world and in the American underground, where loyal fans have quietly shared foreign-language editions of his groundbreaking work in the outermost edges of bondage and pornography. Beyond the comic book format, Tagame's original artwork has been exhibited internationally and paired with the works of Tom of Finland. Tagame was also the founding Editor and Art Director of Japan's most widely circulated gay journal, G-Men.

name: Jiraiya Greeting Card + Envelope
description:
5" x 7" greeting card emblazoned with an original illustration Jiraiya created for MASSIVE's Jiraiya Sweatshirt. The back side contains Jiraiya's original text about the two men in the illustration, Asakichi (朝吉) and Seiji (清次):
These two guys have the same muscle mass, but I'd guess different body fat percentages. In my opinion, they're a perfect couple. But if they fight, their house will be partially destroyed.
The custom envelope features a print of Jiraiya's pencil sketch for the illustration.

name: 5 Jiriaya Greeting Cards
description:
Set of 5 Jiraiya greeting cards and custom envelopes. 5" x 7" greeting card emblazoned with an original illustration Jiraiya created for MASSIVE's Jiraiya Sweatshirt. The back side contains Jiraiya's original text about the two men in the illustration, Asakichi (朝吉) and Seiji (清次):
These two guys have the same muscle mass, but I'd guess different body fat percentages. In my opinion, they're a perfect couple. But if they fight, their house will be partially destroyed.
The custom envelope features a print of Jiraiya's pencil sketch for the illustration.

name: Police Stories
description:
Police Stories is a collaborative doujinshi created by three incredible artists from three different nations: Fabrissou (France), Kumada Masato (USA), and Gengoroh Tagame (Japan). 

Fabrissou and Kumada Masato both contribute scintillating short manga stories of love and lust on the police force, alongside original illustrations of cops in compromising positions drawn by the inimitable Gengoroh Tagame.

Page Count: 36 pages 
Dimensions: 7.17" x 10.12" 
Language: Japanese 
Release Date: October 27, 2013
Publisher: Kumada Books / Fabrissou

Imported from Japan. 40 copies available.

name: The Adventures of Kamejiro by Kazuhide Ichikawa
description:
The Adventures of Kamejiro (太田亀治朗物語), 2013 
Doujinshi by Kazuhide Ichikawa (市川和秀)

When 52-year-old security guard Kamejiro's supervisor recognizes him from a gay porn DVD, Kamejiro has no idea the adventures he's in for. Okay, maybe he has some idea. 

Page Count: 24 pages 
Dimensions: 7.17" x 10.12" 
Language: Japanese 
Release Date: August 11, 2013
Publisher: Ichikawado

Imported directly from the author. 40 copies available.

name: The Passion of Gengoroh Tagame Poster
description:
Poster collage of panels and illustrations from Gengoroh Tagame's first English-language anthology, "The Passion of Gengoroh Tagame."

13" x 19" 
100 lb glossy paper

name: Bison/Tiger Date by Kazuhide Ichikawa
description: Bison/Tiger Date (牛虎デエト), 2013 Doujinshi by Kazuhide Ichikawa (市川和秀) What happens when Antonio and Kotetsu from the popular anime series Tiger & Bunny (タイガー＆バニー) take time off from fighting crime to go on a date? Find out in this short but sweet fan fiction by Kazuhide Ichikawa! Page Count: 16 pages Dimensions: 7.17" x 10.12" Language: Japanese Release Date: December 30, 2011 Publisher: Kazuhide Ichikawa More pictures on Gay Manga! 3 copies available. Imported from Japan.

name: Jiraiya Beach Towel
description: Jiraiya Beach Towel 30" x 58" (76cm x 147cm) Introducing the Jiraiya Beach Towel! Featuring an adorable and sexy illustration by the legendary gay erotic artist Jiraiya, designed by Graham Kolbeins and produced by Anne Ishii, this towel is a must-have beach and poolside accessory! Due to the high cost of manufacturing, only a very limited number of these towels were made. Get them while they last! On Coronado Beach At San Diego Comic Con

name: Jiraiya Beach Towel Ultra Collector's Package
description:
To celebrate the release of the Jiraiya Beach Towel, we put together this extremely limited edition package for fans and collectors. The package includes:

1. The Jiraiya Beach Towel.
2. A hand-screened tote bag, featuring the Massive logo designed by Jiraiya.
3. A hand-signed card by Jiraiya, direct from Hokkaido, Japan.

Only 25 of these packages exist!

name: Muscle Octameron by Gengoroh Tagame
description: Muscle Octameron (筋肉奇譚), 2012 by Gengoroh Tagame Anthology of some of Tagame's most recent (2009-2012) short manga stories, originally published in the magazines Badi (バディ) and Nikutai-Ha (肉体派). Contents The Cretan Crow (クレタの牝牛) Monster Hunt Show (モンスター・ハント・ショー) Hot Oden (おでんぐつぐつ) The Job Switch (転職) END LINE Company Slave Elegy (社畜哀歌) Exorcism* (鬼祓え) Missing* (ミッシング～) *Exorcism and Missing are also available in English translation in The Passion of Gengoroh Tagame. Page Count: 132 pages Dimensons: 5.8" x 8.25" Language: Japanese Release Date: September 12th, 2012 Publisher: Oaks Only one copy available. Imported from Japan.

name: The Demon Who Lives in the Tower Keep/Gunji by Gengoroh Tagame
description: The Demon Who Lives in the Tower Keep/Gunji (天守に棲む鬼／軍次), 2005 Collection of manga by Gengoroh Tagame (田亀源五郎) Contents: The Demon Who Lives in the Tower Keep (天守に棲む鬼), 2004 Gunji (軍次), 2002 I Could Never Tell You That I Love You (ずっと好きだと言えなくて), 2004 Hairy Oracle, 2004 The Sow's Heaven (メス豚の天国), 2003 The Ballad of Oeyama (大江山綺譚), 2004 Page Count: 248 pages Dimensons: 5.8" x 8.25" Language: Japanese Release Date: November 2005 Publisher: Furukawa Shobou/Bakudan Comics Only one copy available. Imported from Japan.

name: Burst Beast (Perfect Edition) by Seizoh Ebisubashi
description: Burst Beast (バーストビースト) Perfect Edition, 2012 Manga by Seizoh Ebisubashi (戎橋政造) This 352-page "perfect" edition is the definitive collection of one of Seizoh Ebisubashi's most beloved stories, Burst Beast. The tale's sexual superhero is a hulking yet timid, bespectacled office worker by day-- but by night, with a pair of briefs covering his face, he becomes a gachi-muchi "Beast" devoted to sexual corporate espionage! Page Count: 352 pages Dimensions: 5.9" x 8.25" Language: Japanese Release Date: June 1st, 2012 Publisher: Bakudan / Furukawa Shobou More photos from the book on Gay Manga!

name: Riot Squad Boyz by Kazuhide Ichikawa
description: Riot Squad Boyz (機動隊恋時雨), 2011 Doujinshi by Kazuhide Ichikawa (市川和秀) This self-published manga by the incomparable "Kaz" finally gets to the bottom of what riot police are really up to in all that gear. Page Count: 24 pages Dimensions: 7.17" x 10.12" Language: Japanese Release Date: May 27, 2011 Publisher: Kazuhide Ichikawa More pictures on Gay Manga! 3 copies available. Imported from Japan.

name: Love Thief by Takeshi Matsu
description: Love Thief (想い想われスリスラレ), 2009 Collection of manga by Takeshi Matsu (松武) A pickpocket, a cop, and a middle-aged convenience store worker are just a few of the unlikely and enchanting characters in Takeshi Matsu’s Love Thief. Each of Love Thief's six short stories creates a thoughtfully rendered world full of humor, romance, eye candy and plenty of hot sex! Page Count: 168 pages Dimensions: 5" x 7.15" Language: Japanese Release Date: December 12, 2009 Publisher: Muscle Aqua Comics 3 copies available. Imported from Japan. More photos on Gay Manga!

name: Five Person Room by Jiraiya
description: Five Person Room (五人部屋), 2004 by Jiraiya (児雷也) Five Person Room is Jiraiya's first collection from 2004. This 239-page anthology includes 12 short manga and color illustrations originally published in G-men and SM-Z magazines between 1999 and 2003. Contents: "Five Person Room" (五人部屋) "Festival of the Tatsukobe Temple" (竜首神社例大祭奉納神楽) "The Smell of Indigo" (藍の匂い) "Sumo Wrestling Ceremony of Yatsukichi Temple" (八吉神社例大祭奉納相撲) "Feast of Fishery" (大漁旗ゆれた) "My Father's Boyfriend" (親父の恋人) "Harbor Festival Passion" (港祭天狗岩御縄飾) "Koi-nyobou" (恋女房) "Koi-nyobou After That" 恋女房 その後 (描き下ろし) "Goro" (五郎) "Promise" (約束) "Five Person Room: HARD MIX" (五人部屋 -HARD MIX-) Page Count: 239 pages Dimensons: 5.9" x 8.34" Language: Japanese Release Date: December 2004 Publisher: Bakudan / Furukawa Shobou One copy available. Imported from Japan. More photos on Gay Manga!

name: Infiltration!! by Kumada Poohsuke
description: Infiltration!! Sneaking into the Man Cave & the Woman's Garden (潜入!!男の隠れ家&女の園), 2013 Manga by Kumada Poohsuke (熊田 プウ助) Infiltration!! finds the intrepid Kumada Poohsuke on a wild journey through the mysteries of gender and sexuality. Through interviews with experts in their fields, Poohsuke learns about subjects as diverse as cross-dressing, cruising, wrestling, medieval fighting and pole-dancing! Page Count: 134 pages Dimensons: 5.9" x 8.2" Language: Japanese Release Date: March 25th, 2013 Publisher: Take Shobo / Bamboo Essay Selection Only one copy available. Imported from Japan.

name: Scar Face by Gai Mizuki
description:
Scar Face, 2013
Doujinshi by Gai Mizuki (水樹凱) aka Rycanthropy

Gai Mizuki's Scar Face tells the short but sweet tale of a rugged and rough P.E. teacher who falls into the hands of a sadistic group of students in the equipment storage room. 

Page Count: 24 pages
Dimensions: 7.17" x 10.12"
Language: Japanese
Release Date: March 31, 2013
Publisher: Rycanthropy

Only one copy available. Imported from Japan.

name: Hanayuke! by Seizoh Ebisubashi
description: Hanayuke! (ハナユケ!), 2011 Manga by Seizoh Ebisubashi (戎橋政造) Hanayuke! is a love story between Kanta and Shuji, two childhood friends who reunite when Kanta returns to their small town after studying in Tokyo. Over the course of the narrative, the friends get to know each other in every way possible. Hanayuke! is an intimate and tender tale with no deficit of hot sex scenes, based on Fuurin Minami's (南風鈴) novel, The City of Lights and the Hometown of Hot Springs (華の都と湯煙の故郷). Page Count: 290 pages Dimensons: 5.9" x 8.2" Language: Japanese Release Date: August 5th, 2011 Publisher: Bakudan / Furukawa Shobou More photos on Gay Manga! Only one copy available. Imported from Japan.

name: Shouka Dou #7 by Takeshi Matsu and Tsukasa Matsuzaki
description: Shouka Dou #7 (松花堂), 2012 Doujinshi by Takeshi Matsu (松武) & Tsukasa Matsuzaki (松崎司) The beach-themed 7th issue of Shouka Dou, an ongoing collaboration between two beloved gay mangaka. Page Count: 52 pages Dimensions: 7.17" x 10.12" Language: Japanese Release Date: August 12, 2012 Publisher: Takeshi Matsu & Tsukasa Matsuzaki Out of print! Only one copy available. Imported from Japan.
